targets.expr: sum by(pod, uri)(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", uri!~"/actuator/.+"}) / sum by(pod, uri)(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", uri!~"/actuator/.+"})

panels.description: Total CPU time consumed by all tasks in seconds. This metric is derived from prometheus metric.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[5m])) by (pod, container, namespace) /
sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", container!="POD", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", namespace=~"$namespace"}/container_spec_cpu_period{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", container!="POD", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}) by (pod, container, namespace)

panels.title: Fabric CPU Usage
